story_parts.text: A lion went to the city. He saw a lot of people and buildings. He also saw a lot of cars. He was very excited.
next_options: The lion roars and the people run away in fear
The lion walks up to a person and asks them for a tour of the city
story_parts.selected_option: The lion roars and the people run away in fear

story_parts.text: The lion roars and the people run away in fear. The lion is very happy. He has never seen so many people before. He is very excited.
next_options: The lion continues to roar and the people continue to run away
The lion stops roaring and the people stop running away
